column4: can anyone check this error i got while installing aptoncd  http://paste.ubuntu.com/87563/
can anyone check this error i got while installing aptoncd  http://paste.ubuntu.com/87563/
You need to install the newest version of Python
python-central*
Go to System -> Administration -> Synaptic Package Manager, and search for "python-central", and update.
Does it say that in Synaptic?
How are you on IRC? Are you on a separate computer?
What version of Ubuntu are you running on the other system?
Go here http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy-updates/python-central, and download the package, and pen drive it to your other system and install it.
http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy-updates/all/python-central/download
Direct link: http://mirrors.kernel.org/ubuntu/pool/main/p/python-central/python-central_0.6.7ubuntu0.1_all.deb
When you install with dpkg, use the --force parameter.
sudo dpkg -i -f package.deb
or maybe it goes after, try both >__<
Did it work?
It's still returning the same error?
Where is the problem then? (sorry if that sounded rude, was not my intention)
You can't use apt-get to install if you can't connect to the web servers.
Download the .deb files and install them manually.
